entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:30 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -37.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 9:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -37.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa steady
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -41.7°C
Wind: NE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Ice fog patches developing this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. Wind chill minus 55 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
